system_context: You are an intelligent course advisor assistant with access to comprehensive course data from Kyoto University of Advanced Science. You can recommend courses based on student interests, career goals, workload preferences, and academic requirements.

course_database.description: Advanced study of electromagnetic fields, waves, and their applications in engineering systems including antennas, transmission lines, and wireless communications.
Comprehensive introduction to C programming language covering fundamental concepts, data structures, and algorithm implementation for engineering applications.
learning_outcomes: Write efficient C programs for engineering problems
Implement basic data structures and algorithms

course_database.description: Advanced Japanese language course focusing on current events discussion, newspaper reading comprehension, and critical thinking through media analysis.
learning_outcomes: Read and analyze Japanese newspapers effectively
Understand Japanese media and social issues

course_database.description: Preparatory capstone project course involving research, design, and development of engineering solutions under faculty guidance.
Comprehensive introduction to production engineering covering manufacturing processes, quality control, lean manufacturing, and industrial automation.
Hands-on training in traditional and modern machining techniques, precision manufacturing, and workshop safety practices essential for mechanical engineering.
learning_outcomes: Operate various machine tools safely and effectively

course_database.description: Comprehensive study of electrical motor principles, design, control, and applications in industrial and automotive systems.
Advanced mathematical course focusing on solving differential equations with one independent variable. Essential for engineering modeling and analysis.
learning_outcomes: Solve various types of differential equations analytically
Apply Laplace transforms to solve complex problems
Model real-world engineering problems using differential equations
Implement numerical methods for approximate solutions

course_database.description: Advanced study of robotic manipulator kinematics, dynamics, control, and path planning for industrial and service robot applications.

course_database.course_name: Fourier Analysis and Partial Differential Equations
course_database.description: Advanced mathematical methods including Fourier analysis, partial differential equations, and their applications in engineering problem solving.
learning_outcomes: Apply Fourier analysis to engineering problems
Model physical phenomena using mathematical methods
Use numerical techniques for complex problems

course_database.description: Advanced power electronic systems covering power conversion, motor drives, renewable energy systems, and smart grid technologies.
Comprehensive study of scientific measurement techniques, instrumentation systems, data acquisition, and experimental design for engineering research.
learning_outcomes: Design measurement systems for engineering applications

course_database.description: Advanced analog electronic circuit design covering operational amplifiers, filters, oscillators, and power management circuits.
learning_outcomes: Analyze circuit performance using simulation tools

course_database.description: Comprehensive career planning course covering self-assessment, industry analysis, job search strategies, and professional development planning.
learning_outcomes: Develop clear career goals and pathways

course_database.description: Comprehensive program focusing on physical fitness, team sports, leadership skills, and personal development through structured athletic and recreational activities.
Study of material behavior under various loading conditions including stress, strain, and deformation analysis. Fundamental for mechanical and civil engineering.
learning_outcomes: Analyze stress and strain in engineering materials
Design structural elements for safety and efficiency
Apply engineering mechanics principles to real structures

course_database.description: Advanced control theory covering modern control techniques, state-space methods, and digital control systems for engineering applications.
Comprehensive Japanese language course covering fundamental grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, and conversation skills for daily communication.
learning_outcomes: Read and write fundamental Japanese texts
Apply language skills in daily situations

course_database.description: Specialized Japanese language course focusing on business communication, formal writing, keigo (honorific language), and professional interaction skills.
learning_outcomes: Communicate professionally in Japanese business contexts
Write formal business documents in Japanese
Understand Japanese business culture and etiquette
Conduct meetings and presentations in Japanese

course_database.description: Advanced study of electrochemical principles, battery technology, corrosion science, and electroplating processes for engineering applications.
learning_outcomes: Design battery and fuel cell systems
Apply electrochemical principles to energy systems

course_database.description: Hands-on laboratory experience in mechatronics systems focusing on energy applications, sensor integration, and automated control systems.
Advanced digital signal processing covering algorithm design, filter implementation, and applications in communications and multimedia systems.
learning_outcomes: Design digital filters for various applications
Apply signal processing to real-world problems

ai_capabilities: Recommend courses based on career goals (e.g., robotics, chemistry, business)
Filter courses by workload and time commitment
Suggest courses by difficulty level and prerequisites
Advise on course combinations and academic planning
Answer questions about specific course content and outcomes
Help with course selection based on industry connections
sample_questions: What courses do you recommend me to pick to pursue robotics?
What course related to chemistry has less workload?
Which courses have the highest satisfaction ratings?
What are the best courses for someone interested in business and economics?
Which engineering courses connect to major companies like Toyota or Sony?
What courses require less than 5 hours per week of study time?
Which courses have the clearest teaching and materials?
